DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize vytorin improve insulin resistance compare simvastatin
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Metabolic Effects Vytorin v Simvastatin
DOC.criteria: hypercholesterolemic patient ( LDL cholesterol level > 100 mg/dl ) overt liver disease , chronic renal failure , hypothyroidism , myopathy , uncontrolled diabetes ( HbA1c > 9 % ) , severe hypertension , stroke , acute coronary event , coronary revascularization within precede 3 month , alcohol abuse
